pullRequest.body:
It was observed on [Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/making.20.60op.60.20irreducible) that we should really have `op` as the custom name for the `Opposite` constructor as long as it remains a structure.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: !bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/d6cb5f88-8e19-48b1-b5c4-190ef6dafd0f) for commit 1346887f9be3191dc3ec2b8c47f90c30916ee000.
The entire run failed.
Found no significant differences.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/7d572d9e-109f-47d8-bb63-f72dcff1ca2b) for commit 43319a8594857a7c0f63ac242a9fb7008876080d.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/a3e655e1-37c4-44a5-94be-49ebc06bcd67/to/7d572d9e-109f-47d8-bb63-f72dcff1ca2b) against commit 61b5888ff8e12bedb74e9338e6a3250d169da6cf:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                   Metric         Change
  =================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction              instructions    -4.7%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties      instructions    -5.4%
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.PresheafedSpace.Gluing        instructions    -3.4%
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.PresheafedSpace.HasColimits   instructions    -7.6%
```
It is strange that the CI build succeeds even though there is still a sorry!
Oh yeah. That doesn't seem good
!bench

:v: mattrobball can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/4a8853cf-1b43-452a-b757-4a08c212f9e0) for commit 4ecb44e24a3437ba7e2c5a4742947e5398b0dc4c.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/7732e82c-00a0-4b2e-b4b8-5f5dae2dd88a/to/4a8853cf-1b43-452a-b757-4a08c212f9e0) against commit ded3fb6262f4fb8850ea4d5fffe6bad7d3d82ef5:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                   Metric         Change
  =================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction              instructions    -4.3%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties      instructions    -5.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Geometry.RingedSpace.PresheafedSpace.HasColimits   instructions    -7.5%
```
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9006743305/job/24744951857)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9006743305/job/24744951209)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9006743305/job/24744951655)

Thanks :tada: 

If CI passes, please remove the label `awaiting-CI` and merge this yourself, by adding a comment `bors r+`.

bors d+

bors d+
